item.description:
It's getting hot in here??????? Hawaiian Theme night
Come on down and join us in Malden.
We'll be dancing outside under the Big Top and having a great time.
Last month's was a good turnout with over 140 people attending.
Expecting even more at this one, and the best Hawaiin Costume wins $20
Practic your Limbo and Twist too!
Great Music / Relaxed atmosphere / Fun people / Free Hot Dogs / Cash Bar
Don't be shy and come on down.
Doors open at 8 pm, early bird cover is $5 till 8:30 pm $10 after
item.name: Hakuna Matata, Hawaiin Theme Night
